dublin_core.dcvalue: Despite the massive growth of on line information resources many clinicians still prefer to obtain information from other clinicians particularly those to whom they refer patients Based on this notion and an information needs assessment we developed the Professional s Information Link PiL a Web based asynchronous consultation service to facilitate question answering between rural clinicians and an academic medical center The system aims to provide answers to questions within two working days It also includes patient handouts and continuing medical education resources Our preliminary evaluation demonstrates modest but enthusiastic use of the system
Proceedings / AMIA ... Annual Symposium. AMIA Symposium
Professional's Information Link (PiL): a web-based asynchronous consultation service.
